decision_reasoning: Board unreasonably concluded FARC targeted only Ms. Villegas' brothers and required conclusive evidence for their deaths
decision_made: Decision set aside; case remanded for reconsideration considering subsection 108(4)
refugee_status: claimed refugee status due to alleged persecution by FARC in Colombia
procedure_followed: Judicial review of the Immigration and Refugee Boardâ€™s decision rejecting her claim
conclusion_outcome: The Board's decision is quashed, and the case is remitted for reconsideration by a different panel
